install.query: CREATE TABLE `pointsrewardsregistry` ( `idpointsrewardsregistry` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `points` int(10) NOT NULL, `type` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `comment` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `statusid` int(10) default NULL, `clientid` int(10) default NULL, `uniqueid` int(10) default NULL, `adddate` timestamp NOT NULL default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP on update CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `viewid` int(10) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`idpointsrewardsregistry`), KEY `FK_pointsrewardsregistry_viewid` (`viewid`), CONSTRAINT `FK_pointsrewardsregistry_viewid` FOREIGN KEY (`viewid`) REFERENCES `view` (`idview`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
